rlBgp.name: rlBgp
rlBgp.description: The private MIB module definition for RND BGP private MIB.

rlBgpMibVersion.name: rlBgpMibVersion
rlBgpMibVersion.description: BGP4 Mib version, the current version is 1.

rlBgpPeersExtTable.name: rlBgpPeersExtTable
rlBgpPeersExtTable.description: BGP peer table. Contains one entry per BGP peer, information about the connections with BGP peers.

rlBgpPeersExtEntry.name: rlBgpPeersExtEntry
rlBgpPeersExtEntry.description: Entry containing information about the connection with a BGP peer.

rlBgpPeersExtRowStatus.name: rlBgpPeersExtRowStatus
rlBgpPeersExtRowStatus.description: The row status variable, used according to installation and removal conventions for conceptual rows. Setting this object to active(1) or createAndGo(4) results in the addition of the remote address of the peer. Destroying the entry or setting it to notInService(2) removes the remote address associated with the peer. The use of other values is implementation-dependent.

rlBgpPeersExtIsReflectorClient.name: rlBgpPeersExtIsReflectorClient
rlBgpPeersExtIsReflectorClient.description: This value indicates whether the given peer is a reflector client of this router, or not. A value of client indicates that this peer is a reflector client that is not fully meshed with other reflector clients. A value of meshedClient indicates that the peer is a reflector client and is fully meshed with all other clients because there is no route reflection. The default value is meshedClient.

rlBgpPeersExtInConfederation.name: rlBgpPeersExtInConfederation
rlBgpPeersExtInConfederation.description: This value indicates whether the given peer is in our confederation or not.

rlBgpPeersExtRemAS.name: rlBgpPeersExtRemAS
rlBgpPeersExtRemAS.description: The remote autonomous system number which is configurable.

rlBgpClusterId.name: rlBgpClusterId
rlBgpClusterId.description: The configured Cluster-ID of the local router. A value of 0.0.0.0 indicates the absence of this value.

rlBgpConfederationId.name: rlBgpConfederationId
rlBgpConfederationId.description: The local Confederation Identification Number. A value of zero (0) indicates the absence of this value.

rlBgpEnable.name: rlBgpEnable
rlBgpEnable.description: This value indicates whether BGP is enable on this router or not.

rlBgpRouteReflectionEnable.name: rlBgpRouteReflectionEnable
rlBgpRouteReflectionEnable.description: This value indicates whether route reflection extension is enable on this router or not.

rlBgpASConfederationEnable.name: rlBgpASConfederationEnable
rlBgpASConfederationEnable.description: This value indicates whether AS confederation extension is enable on this router or not.

rlBgpRouteFlapDampeningEnable.name: rlBgpRouteFlapDampeningEnable
rlBgpRouteFlapDampeningEnable.description: This value indicates whether route flap dampening extension is enable on this router or not.

rlBgpCommunitiesEnable.name: rlBgpCommunitiesEnable
rlBgpCommunitiesEnable.description: This value indicates whether BGP communities extension is enable on this router or not.

rlBgpCapabilNegotEnable.name: rlBgpCapabilNegotEnable
rlBgpCapabilNegotEnable.description: This value indicates whether BGP capabilities negotiation extension is enable on this router or not.

rlBgpMedConf.name: rlBgpMedConf
rlBgpMedConf.description: The configured Multi-Exit Descriminator of the local router. A value of -1 indicates the absence of this attribute.

rlBgpLocalPrefConf.name: rlBgpLocalPrefConf
rlBgpLocalPrefConf.description: The configured Local Preference of the local router. A value of -1 indicates the absence of this attribute.

rlBgpLocalAsConf.name: rlBgpLocalAsConf
rlBgpLocalAsConf.description: The local autonomous system number, which is configurable.

rlBgp4PathAttrExtTable.name: rlBgp4PathAttrExtTable
rlBgp4PathAttrExtTable.description: The BGP-4 Received Path Attribute Table contains information about paths to destination networks received from all BGP4 peers.

rlBgp4PathAttrExtEntry.name: rlBgp4PathAttrExtEntry
rlBgp4PathAttrExtEntry.description: Information about a path to a network.

rlBgp4PathAttrOriginatorId.name: rlBgp4PathAttrOriginatorId
rlBgp4PathAttrOriginatorId.description: The Originator-ID identifying the router that initially advertised this destination to a Route Reflector. A value of 0.0.0.0 indicates the absence of this attribute. This attribute is defined in [RFC2796].

rlBgp4PathAttrClusterList.name: rlBgp4PathAttrClusterList
rlBgp4PathAttrClusterList.description: A sequence of four octet long values representing the reflection path that the route has passed. Each four octet long value represents the ID of a cluster that the route has traversed. A length of zero (0) indicates the absence of this attribute. This attribute is defined in [RFC2796].

rlBgp4PathAttrCommunities.name: rlBgp4PathAttrCommunities
rlBgp4PathAttrCommunities.description: A sequence of four octet long values representing the community that was received with the route. The values of each of the individual octets may have semantic meaning. A length of zero (0) indicates the absence of this attribute. This attribute is defined in [RFC1997].

rlBgpSuppressLimit.name: rlBgpSuppressLimit
rlBgpSuppressLimit.description: A numeric value that is compared with the penalty. If the penalty is greater than the suppress limit, the route is suppressed. Default value is 2000.

rlBgpReuseLimit.name: rlBgpReuseLimit
rlBgpReuseLimit.description: A configurable numeric value that is compared with the penalty. If the penalty is less than the reuse limit, a suppressed route that is up will no longer be suppressed. Default value is 750.

rlBgpHalfLifeTime.name: rlBgpHalfLifeTime
rlBgpHalfLifeTime.description: A configurable numeric value that describes the time required to reduce the penalty by one half. Default value is 15.

rlBgpMaxSuppressTime.name: rlBgpMaxSuppressTime
rlBgpMaxSuppressTime.description: A configurable numeric value that describes the maximum time a route can be suppressed no matter how unstable it has been prior to this period ofstability. Default value is 4*rlBgpHalfLifeTime.
